descriptionHtml:
[b][i][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]Uploaded by request.

This mod adds the Vindskjaer Bow from my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59437/?]"Nock to Tip" mod.[/url] This is a standalone mod and doesn't require anything else to work. The bow has been added as a levled item, meaning you can't craft or temper it. There are five tiers, each with increased damage.  Which bow you get is determined by what level you are when you find it (just like the nightingale bow). I placed the bow in DragonsReach, in the Jarl's quarters. If you're not familiar with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59437/?]Nock to Tip[/url], here's the basic features of the Vindskjaer Bow:

Double framed
Triple stringed
Lore friendly sights
Very high damage
Very slow drawtime

Note; if you do use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59437/?]Nock to Tip,[/url] you don't need this. Please endorse if you enjoy the mod, and leave feedback/questions in the comments section.
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b]
author: Foster
